laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour and no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow and no ascites. Gallbladder is moderately distended with a single calculus noted in the neck, gallbladder wall thickening, and pericholecystic fluid present. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. Kidneys show no hydronephrosis; right kidney measures 10.1 cm, left kidney measures 10.5 cm.
8.5 mg/dL; reference range 8.4 - 10.3 mg/dL (result within normal range).
